title: Ryan Kerrigan interview, top 30 players over 30 years old (Football 06/19)
description:
Will Brinson (finally) returns from vacation and welcomes Sean Wagner-McGough to break down the latest NFL news and look at his 30 over 30 list of NFL players. Then Redskins pass rusher Ryan Kerrigan joins the show to talk about the expectations for Washington's defense, how Alex Smith has impacted the team so far, how the Capitals Stanley Cup win affects other D.C. sports teams, whether pineapple belongs on pizza, his work with Gatorade to #BeatTheHeat and much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Will Brinson is joined by Sean Wagner-McGough to talk top 30 over 30 in the NFL. Ryan Kerrigan joins the show to talk Alex Smith, the Caps winning the Stanley Cup, and if pineapple belongs on pizza.
